original_text: Then be careful! Do not become proud. Never forget the Lord your God who brought you out of Egypt. He rescued you from the place where you were slaves.
korean_text: 네 마음이 교만하여 네 하나님 여호와를 잊어버릴까 염려하노라 여호와는 너를 애굽 땅 종 되었던 집에서 이끌어 내시고

sentences.original_text: Never forget the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 하나님 주님을 결코 잊지 말라

sentences.original_text: who brought you out of Egypt.
from the place where you were slaves.
